hero.title: Hi, I'm
hero.subtitle: Building modern web & mobile applications
hero.description: Hi! I'm a React developer who strives to create functional web/mobile applications. My goal is to make my work as efficient and user-friendly as possible. I started my journey in programming with simple projects, and since then, I've been continuously learning and improving. I'm ready to face challenges and always try to find a solution for every task. I'd be happy to help bring your ideas to life!

cv.title: Curriculum Vitae
cv.name: Narek Kolyan
cv.bio: Hi! I'm a React developer who strives to create functional web/mobile applications. My goal is to make my work as efficient and user-friendly as possible. I started my journey in programming with simple projects, and since then, I've been continuously learning and improving. I'm ready to face challenges and always try to find a solution for every task. I'd be happy to help bring your ideas to life!
cv.professionalSummaryText: Full-Stack React & React Native Developer with 4+ years of commercial experience building complex web and mobile applications. Specialized in e-commerce, large-scale data management platforms, API integrations, and high-performance frontend solutions. Strong background in TypeScript, modern state management, and delivering pixel-perfect, scalable products.

shelllogix.description: Outsource-based software company specializing in web and mobile-based work management, project management, and custom digital solutions.
shelllogix.work1: Worked on various client projects as part of an outsource team, developing web and mobile applications using React, React Native, and TypeScript
shelllogix.work2: Collaborated with international clients and teams to deliver high-quality software solutions
shelllogix.work3: Built responsive web applications and cross-platform mobile apps with modern state management and secure authentication
shelllogix.work4: Contributed to multiple projects including e-commerce platforms, business management tools, and financial applications

opta.description: World leader in sports AI. With 7.2 petabytes of proprietary sports data and 8 foundation sports AI models, empowering the world's top sports broadcasters, media, apps, leagues, federations, bookmakers and teams.
opta.work1: Managed, validated, and edited large-scale sports datasets across multiple leagues with 100% accuracy and strict deadlines
opta.work2: Coordinated with global data teams to deliver real-time statistics to broadcasters, media partners, and betting companies
opta.work3: Strong domain knowledge in sports data helped significantly in building accurate filtering and statistics-heavy UIs

cv.additionalInfo1: Available for full-time remote or relocation
cv.additionalInfo2: Passionate about clean code, performance, and beautiful UI/UX
cv.additionalInfo4: Fast learner – successfully transitioned from sports data industry to full-time software engineering

education.degree: Bachelor's Degree in Agriculture Marketing & Business
education.coursework: Relevant coursework: Economics, Statistics, Project Management

skills.title: Skills & Technologies
skills.subtitle: A comprehensive toolkit for building modern web and mobile applications

projects.title: Featured Projects
projects.subtitle: A collection of my recent work, including web applications, mobile apps, and open-source tools

accounting-platform.description: My first project - still in use today. Multi-language web application for accounting services in Armenia. Features canvas forms and form-to-email functionality. Built with modern React stack.

crypto-admin-panel.description: Admin panel for cryptocurrency exchange and statistics. Built for a Ukrainian company. Features real-time crypto exchange rates, trading statistics, and comprehensive admin dashboard. Frontend development only.

mobile-ecommerce-solution.description: Russian company providing ready-to-use mobile shopping applications for 100+ brands from Russia, UK, and US. Solutions for various industries from pharmacy to automobile. Features 5+ analytics variants, custom backend, Shopify backend integration. Worked as fullstack developer (React, React Native, Node.js) with 40+ team members.

rv-rental-platform.description: US-based company project for RV rental services. Custom Shopify solution allowing clients to rent RV vehicles and book campgrounds. Worked as React developer on multiple RV rental related projects.

ai-social-media-generator.description: Business tool for generating social media posts using multiple AI models. Generates videos by parts and seamlessly connects them together. Automates content creation workflow for businesses. Built for US client.

git-cli-tool.description: npm package for managing multiple Git identities. Easily switch between work, personal, and organization accounts with cross-platform support. Personal open-source project.

service-admin-panel.description: Russian company based in Cyprus with 50+ employees. Enterprise admin dashboard for user segmentation and marketing campaigns. Features real-time analytics, advanced filtering, and integrations with HubSpot and Communication Service.

mobile-webview-app.description: React Native application with WebView integration for displaying company website. Main feature is per-app VPN functionality that users can enable directly in the app. Built for previous company.

game.title: Memory Game
game.subtitle: Match all pairs of cards to win! Test your memory skills.
game.instructions: Click on cards to flip them. Match pairs to win!

footer.description: Full Stack Developer passionate about building modern web applications.
